bossDialog: Commiserations, mendicant; I have deigned to requisition these sorcerous provisions for my own contemplations. Be off with you.
Do you MIND?! You're enturbulating the inverse negative transflux flow of the local coalescent arcanospheric manifold, you utter buffoon!
I object most vehemently to your sudden odiferous habitation of my private environs! Begone lest I lambaste your inadequate sanitation further!

cardBonuses.2: Your creatures deal 5% more damage with spells.
cardBonuses.4: Your creatures deal 5% more damage with spells.
cardBonuses.7: Your creatures deal 5% more damage with spells.

master.dialog: Familiars are studious creatures who work together for a common cause - often in an effort to better their own research. Familiars are always looking for new ways to power up their spells. Care to see firsthand what they've learned recently?
master.name: Bayaz

name: Familiar
